page.title: 10FARMING AROUND EPPING
page.content: There are no cows at Epping Bury now as the{E.E.C.}gives more money to {cereal}growers.Healthy eating in 1985 means cutting down on animal fat and sugar.Oilseed rape provides vegetable oil so it is a very popular crop.It is also of benefit to the farmer because it is sown and harvested between the cereal harvest, so spreading the work load. What Mr Hunt enjoys best about being a farmer is working and living in the countryside, but the worst thing is working in all weathers like snow and rain.{Farmers do not change,}but farming in Epping has. Milk tankers from the West Country can provide London with milk today: years ago dairy farming in Epping was a vital provider of dairy produce to London's residents.
